attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see what all the fuss was about and was completely shook ! First red flag was that it took HOURS for this app to download. All of other apps download within seconds! When the app FINALLY downloaded, inappropriate ads popped up. One add was about a naked woman by the of Stormy Daniels..? Either way my mother walked in and saw the screen, thought I PURPOSELY looked up inappropriate content, and kicked me out of the house. Also, the app made my phone glitch TREMENDOUSLY. 0/10 would not recommend. *DOWNLOAD AT YOUR OWN RISK!!!*
